title: Imaginary Horizons Data Policy
description: If you leave Imaginary Horizons, your data will be deleted.

fields.name: Data Collected
fields.value: HorizonsBot stores user submitted topics, petitions, and club details.

fields.name: Data Usage
fields.value: Imaginary Horizons does not use any user data at this time.
